name: A Fiery Working Title!
description:
Play as Flare, a small fireball that's full of energy! He's wild, a little hot-headed, and likes to fight.

When he discovers that he's in enemy territory, Flare must retaliate and defeat enemies coming his way! But be wary, these enemies are tough!

How long will you last?

Will you prevail?

*

Controls:

- Use the W, A, S, D keys or arrow keys to move

- Use your mouse to face in a direction

- Click the mouse (or hold) to shoot a fireball!

*

Main objective of the game:

Try and get the highest score you can by defeating enemies, and surviving as long as possible! Each level has a unique trait to it, but the last level is a boss level with a different prime objective. Defeat King Tempest to canonically win the game!

Above all, however, just have fun trying to break your own high score, and when you're confident with the controls, go for the boss fight!

*

Key features found in the game:

- There is a high score system that runs universal throughout the game. See which level gets you the highest score!

- You can run into Grasslings to regain HP, but their projectiles are quick.

- You take damage from projectiles, but your fireballs can negate other projectiles, levelling the playing field.

- You take more damage from Aqualings if they touch you, but they, and their projectiles, move slowly.

- The game has 4 stages, where 3 are unique stages and the last is a Boss level. Each level has its own soundtrack!

*

{Currently, only supported on Windows platforms, but I'm trying to get them released on others too!}
